title: 61% winrate with a champion
body:
Teammate still bans it when I hover

lolwutwhy

replies.body:
I was trying to WW jungle in norms when he just came out, second in pick order. Third asks if he can have WW instead. I say no. He bans.

... So basically I selected heim jungle, wasn't going to lock but was fine playing chicken till the last second. Someone dodged though, didn't want heim jungle I guess.
Because once a Tweedle Dee, always a Tweedle Dumb.

It's generally a pretty nasty move to ban a champion from somebody. Even if they're bad at them, I'd rather have somebody with a bad pick that's genuinely trying on my team than somebody that's tilted and pissed off from the get go.

in other thread regarding punishment system and permaban i posted my idea for exactly this type of behaviour 


lower ip gains is a great punishment for this, its not a game breaking behaviour yet is still annoying if done on purpuse same with stealing smns lane in ranked
